greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of first run of 0's in binary expansion of n.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: Table[First[Map[Length, DeleteCases[Split@IntegerDigits[n, 2], w_/;Times@@w>0]]/.{}->{0}], {n, 0, 200}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 23 2016 *) (* after _Michael De Vlieger_ *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 22 2016
